instances.text: EPSE_V 310-B_640 - Assessment and Learning in the Classroom (B)
EPSE_V 310-B_S40 - Assessment and Learning in the Classroom (B)

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Initial restriction: Specialization SPED (including graduate students), EYED, and IDSC; Program BA, specialization EDUC, emphasis SPED; BEDS, BEEM, CIDSC
Restriction will be removed for DEDU on June 24.
Restriction will be removed for UNCL and EDUC graduate students, BKIN (including BKIN minor) and BSC Integrated Science students and BA/BSC in year: >=3 with one of these specializations: PSYC on July 8.
Restriction will be removed for 3rd and 4th year students and other graduate students on July 26.

instances.text: EPSE_V 317-63C - Development and Exceptionality in the Regular Classroom

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Online, asynchronous.

Registration will be blocked when the course is full and seats will be filled from the waitlist.
A priority sequence waitlist is available for this course.

For information on waitlists and restrictions for EPSE courses, including when restrictions will be removed, please visit the EPSE Registration Guide at https://pdce.educ.ubc.ca/epse_registration_guide/.

Please note that students in the BKIN program or any non-Education programs should register in EPSE 312.

Inquiries: online.educ@ubc.ca

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
